description: This table contains information about localization methods for lithotripsy.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LOCALIZATION_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used to store the localization methods used during a lithotripsy procedure.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined
